meanings.definition: Covered with or treated with dung.
meanings.sent1: The dunged field smelled earthy and rich.
meanings.sent2: The farmer used dunged compost to improve the soil quality.
meanings.sent3: The dunged garden attracted many curious insects.
meanings.sent4: The dunged path was a reminder of the farm nearby.
meanings.sent5: The dunged area was teeming with life and nutrients.

meanings.sent1: The dunged plants grew tall and healthy.
meanings.sent2: The dunged soil yielded a bountiful harvest.
meanings.sent3: The dunged flowers bloomed vibrantly in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The dunged fields were a testament to natural fertilization.
meanings.sent5: The dunged crops thrived under the care of the farmer.
